amendment.description: Amendment sought to repeal the statutory prohibition on privately funded abortions in overseas military facilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 14 and printed in part A of H. Rept. 106-175 to allow privately funded abortions at overseas DOD medical facilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meek (FL) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 203 - 225 (Roll no. 184).
